Docs.param: The sRGB color to use at the start of the sweep
The sRGB color to use at the end of the sweep
Docs.summary: A Shader that draws a sweep gradient around a center point.

MemberSignature.Value: public SweepGradient (float cx, float cy, int[] colors, float[]? positions);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(float32 cx, float32 cy, int32[] colors, float32[] positions) cil managed
Public Sub New (cx As Single, cy As Single, colors As Integer(), positions As Single())
public: SweepGradient(float cx, float cy, cli::array <int> ^ colors, cli::array <float> ^ positions);
new Android.Graphics.SweepGradient : single * single * int[] * single[] -> Android.Graphics.SweepGradient

Docs.param: The sRGB colors to be distributed between around the center. There must be at least 2 colors in the array.

May be NULL. The relative position of each corresponding color in the colors array, beginning with 0 and ending with 1.0. If the values are not monotonic, the drawing may produce unexpected results. If positions is NULL, then the colors are automatically spaced evenly.
Docs.summary: A Shader that draws a sweep gradient around a center point.

format.a: Java documentation for android.graphics.SweepGradient.SweepGradient(float, float, int[], float[]).

new Android.Graphics.SweepGradient : single * single * int64[] * single[] -> Android.Graphics.SweepGradient

Docs.param: The colors to be distributed between around the center. There must be at least 2 colors in the array.

May be NULL. The relative position of each corresponding color in the colors array, beginning with 0 and ending with 1.0. If the values are not monotonic, the drawing may produce unexpected results. If positions is NULL, then the colors are automatically spaced evenly.
Docs.summary: A Shader that draws a sweep gradient around a center point.

format.a: Java documentation for android.graphics.SweepGradient.SweepGradient(float, float, long[], float[]).
